Ã‚ÂºÃ‚Âº    Release Date  :  08-18-2004               Protection  :  Securom / SteamÃ‚ÂºÃ‚Âº
Ã‚ÂºÃ‚Âº    File Count    :  13x15 MB                 Game Genre  :  Action / FPS   Ã‚ÂºÃ‚Âº
ÃƒÅ’ÃƒÅ’Ãƒï¿½Ã‚Â°Ã‚Â°Ã‚Â°Ã‚Â°Ã‚Â°Ã‚Â°Ã‚Â°Ã‚Â°Ã‚Â°Ã‚Â°Ã‚Â°Ã‚Â°Ã‚Â°Ã‚Â°Ã‚Â°Ã‚Â°Ã‚Â°Ã‚Â°Ã‚Â°Ã‚Â°Ã‚Â°Ã‚Â°Ã‚Â°Ã‚Â°Ã‚Â°Ã‚Â°Ã‚Â°Ã‚Â°Ã‚Â°Ã‚Â°Ã‚Â°RELEASE NOTESÃ‚Â°Ã‚Â°Ã‚Â°Ã‚Â°Ã‚Â°Ã‚Â°Ã‚Â°Ã‚Â°Ã‚Â°Ã‚Â°Ã‚Â°Ã‚Â°Ã‚Â°Ã‚Â°Ã‚Â°Ã‚Â°Ã‚Â°Ã‚Â°Ã‚Â°Ã‚Â°Ã‚Â°Ã‚Â°Ã‚Â°Ã‚Â°Ã‚Â°Ã‚Â°Ã‚Â°Ã‚Â°Ã‚Â°Ã‚Â°Ãƒï¿½Ã‚Â¹Ã‚Â¹
Ã‚ÂºÃ‚Âº                                                                            Ã‚ÂºÃ‚Âº
Ã‚ÂºÃ‚Âº  This update will update all your games you installed ;)                   Ã‚ÂºÃ‚Âº
Ã‚ÂºÃ‚Âº  Online play works again after this update!                                Ã‚ÂºÃ‚Âº
Ã‚ÂºÃ‚Âº                                                                            Ã‚ÂºÃ‚Âº
Ã‚ÂºÃ‚Âº  Half-Life 2:                                                              Ã‚ÂºÃ‚Âº
Ã‚ÂºÃ‚Âº  Solved disc in drive incompatibility error                                Ã‚ÂºÃ‚Âº
Ã‚ÂºÃ‚Âº  Optimization to the Steam filesystem to reduce game launch and level      Ã‚ÂºÃ‚Âº
Ã‚ÂºÃ‚Âº  transition time                                                           Ã‚ÂºÃ‚Âº
Ã‚ÂºÃ‚Âº                                                                            Ã‚ÂºÃ‚Âº
Ã‚ÂºÃ‚Âº  Half-Life 2 Deathmatch:                                                   Ã‚ÂºÃ‚Âº
Ã‚ÂºÃ‚Âº  Fixed players entering the game with a score of -1                        Ã‚ÂºÃ‚Âº
Ã‚ÂºÃ‚Âº  Fixed combine ball tracking teammates                                     Ã‚ÂºÃ‚Âº
Ã‚ÂºÃ‚Âº  Fixed not being able to grab level designer placed combine balls with     Ã‚ÂºÃ‚Âº
Ã‚ÂºÃ‚Âº  the physics cannon                                                        Ã‚ÂºÃ‚Âº
Ã‚ÂºÃ‚Âº  Fixed players randomly spawning without physcannons                       Ã‚ÂºÃ‚Âº
Ã‚ÂºÃ‚Âº  Fixed multishot pistol exploit                                            Ã‚ÂºÃ‚Âº
Ã‚ÂºÃ‚Âº  Fixed wrong footstep sounds while in team mode                            Ã‚ÂºÃ‚Âº
Ã‚ÂºÃ‚Âº  Fixed last RPG shot not tracking                                          Ã‚ÂºÃ‚Âº
Ã‚ÂºÃ‚Âº  Added cl_defaultweapon -- defaults to weapon_physcannon but can be        Ã‚ÂºÃ‚Âº
Ã‚ÂºÃ‚Âº  changed to any other weapon you spawn with                                Ã‚ÂºÃ‚Âº
Ã‚ÂºÃ‚Âº  Added HUD string to print team name                                       Ã‚ÂºÃ‚Âº
Ã‚ÂºÃ‚Âº  Added model specific death sounds                                         Ã‚ÂºÃ‚Âº
Ã‚ÂºÃ‚Âº  Switching to the physcannon is now instantaneous                          Ã‚ÂºÃ‚Âº
Ã‚ÂºÃ‚Âº  Toned down 357 damage                                                     Ã‚ÂºÃ‚Âº
Ã‚ÂºÃ‚Âº  Updated dm_overwatch                                                      Ã‚ÂºÃ‚Âº
Ã‚ÂºÃ‚Âº                                                                            Ã‚ÂºÃ‚Âº
Ã‚ÂºÃ‚Âº  Counter-Strike:Source:                                                    Ã‚ÂºÃ‚Âº
Ã‚ÂºÃ‚Âº  Added map: de_prodigy                                                     Ã‚ÂºÃ‚Âº
Ã‚ÂºÃ‚Âº  Improved player movement against walls                                    Ã‚ÂºÃ‚Âº
Ã‚ÂºÃ‚Âº  Improved choppy player movement when bouncing down slopes                 Ã‚ÂºÃ‚Âº
Ã‚ÂºÃ‚Âº  Purchase icon for defuser is shown                                        Ã‚ÂºÃ‚Âº
Ã‚ÂºÃ‚Âº  Physics prop avoidance is scaled by the object's mass                     Ã‚ÂºÃ‚Âº
Ã‚ÂºÃ‚Âº  Detail prop fade distance can be controlled on a per-map basis with       Ã‚ÂºÃ‚Âº
Ã‚ÂºÃ‚Âº  env_detail_controller                                                     Ã‚ÂºÃ‚Âº
Ã‚ÂºÃ‚Âº  Spectator GUI last mode is saved                                          Ã‚ÂºÃ‚Âº
Ã‚ÂºÃ‚Âº  Added spectate player by name                                             Ã‚ÂºÃ‚Âº
Ã‚ÂºÃ‚Âº  Grenades, weapons, etc., splash when they land in water                   Ã‚ÂºÃ‚Âº
Ã‚ÂºÃ‚Âº  Frag grenade deafness is delayed so the explosion is heard                Ã‚ÂºÃ‚Âº
Ã‚ÂºÃ‚Âº  Fixed viewmodel lag                                                       Ã‚ÂºÃ‚Âº
Ã‚ÂºÃ‚Âº  Added consistency checking player model bounds                            Ã‚ÂºÃ‚Âº
Ã‚ÂºÃ‚Âº  Weapon reloads finish when the round restarts                             Ã‚ÂºÃ‚Âº
Ã‚ÂºÃ‚Âº  Autobuy and rebuy trigger a reload if you don't buy a primary weapon      Ã‚ÂºÃ‚Âº
Ã‚ÂºÃ‚Âº  Rebuy doesn't drop pistols the player has picked up                       Ã‚ÂºÃ‚Âº
Ã‚ÂºÃ‚Âº  Dropped weapon ammo isn't lost if the player has another weapon using     Ã‚ÂºÃ‚Âº
Ã‚ÂºÃ‚Âº  that ammo                                                                 Ã‚ÂºÃ‚Âº
Ã‚ÂºÃ‚Âº  Re-added hostage hint messages                                            Ã‚ÂºÃ‚Âº
Ã‚ÂºÃ‚Âº  Smoke grenade canisters fade out and are removed when smoke is dense      Ã‚ÂºÃ‚Âº
Ã‚ÂºÃ‚Âº  Breakable glass is blown outward proportional to the damage recieved      Ã‚ÂºÃ‚Âº
Ã‚ÂºÃ‚Âº  Soundscapes update for observers                                          Ã‚ÂºÃ‚Âº
Ã‚ÂºÃ‚Âº  Fixed not being able to attach to ladder tops                             Ã‚ÂºÃ‚Âº
Ã‚ÂºÃ‚Âº  Misc fixes to spray import                                                Ã‚ÂºÃ‚Âº
Ã‚ÂºÃ‚Âº  Enabled bots for LINUX &amp; WIN32                                            Ã‚ÂºÃ‚Âº
Ã‚ÂºÃ‚Âº                                                                            Ã‚ÂºÃ‚Âº
Ã‚ÂºÃ‚Âº  Engine:                                                                   Ã‚ÂºÃ‚Âº
Ã‚ÂºÃ‚Âº  Fixed crash when trying to play an MP3 that doesn't exist or is an        Ã‚ÂºÃ‚Âº
Ã‚ÂºÃ‚Âº  invalid format                                                            Ã‚ÂºÃ‚Âº
Ã‚ÂºÃ‚Âº  Fixed a crash when playing MP3 files with ID3 tags                        Ã‚ÂºÃ‚Âº
Ã‚ÂºÃ‚Âº  Fixed network being started early enough so UDP remote logging works      Ã‚ÂºÃ‚Âº
Ã‚ÂºÃ‚Âº  World rendering optimizations                                             Ã‚ÂºÃ‚Âº
Ã‚ÂºÃ‚Âº  Fixed problems with demo recording                                        Ã‚ÂºÃ‚Âº
Ã‚ÂºÃ‚Âº  Added command &quot;setinfo &quot; to allow clients to add custom user info fields  Ã‚ÂºÃ‚Âº
Ã‚ÂºÃ‚Âº  (creates a new cvar flagged as FCVAR_USERINFO)                            Ã‚ÂºÃ‚Âº
Ã‚ÂºÃ‚Âº  Enable sv_downloadurl &amp; sv_consistency on dedicated servers               Ã‚ÂºÃ‚Âº
Ã‚ÂºÃ‚Âº  Fixed &quot;kick &quot; command via rcon if the name is surrounded by quotes        Ã‚ÂºÃ‚Âº
Ã‚ÂºÃ‚Âº  Fixed bug in &quot;logaddress_add&quot; that wouldn't add the correct port if the   Ã‚ÂºÃ‚Âº
Ã‚ÂºÃ‚Âº  port and address were surrounded by quotes                                Ã‚ÂºÃ‚Âº
Ã‚ÂºÃ‚Âº  Added &quot;player_say&quot; event for 3rd party plugins                            Ã‚ÂºÃ‚Âº
Ã‚ÂºÃ‚Âº  Fixed crash in dedicated servers when issuing a say before the map is run Ã‚ÂºÃ‚Âº
Ã‚ÂºÃ‚Âº  Fixed +ip not being applied when given on the command line                Ã‚ÂºÃ‚Âº
Ã‚ÂºÃ‚Âº  HL2 depot fix for upcoming SDK update                                     Ã‚ÂºÃ‚Âº
Ã‚ÂºÃ‚Âº  Fixed &quot;failed to load server.dll&quot; error with 3rd party mods               Ã‚ÂºÃ‚Âº
Ã‚ÂºÃ‚Âº  Fixed linux dedicated server crash on some GLIBC versions                 Ã‚ÂºÃ‚Âº
Ã‚ÂºÃ‚Âº  Fixed dedicated server error in certain localized languages               Ã‚ÂºÃ‚Âº
Ã‚ÂºÃ‚Âº                                                                            Ã‚ÂºÃ‚Âº
